title: romanzelovsky
author: romanzelovsky
content: Hi, I can offer you betting for you, offline or online you are on right place. If you need help with stake on lower league, I can help you. If you need stake on ITF tennis high stake, contact me. We have contact for betting from all over the world. We can bet for you, we dont touch odd nothing. I would only ask serious buyers to call Telegram. Also, if you have interesting suggestions regarding the payment on your part, you can also contact us. Good contacts are never enough. We have stakers in locals in all world. We can help you with Balkan and all Russian, Belarus, Ukrainen etc. leagues.Telegram contact:@romanzelovskyPS: Please only serious contacts, who know what they are doing.Also you can write contact, we can contactyou.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Betting for you or what ever you called it is not new to me. Betting is just a game of luck. I remembered when I was actively betting, a friend of mine (although younger) came to me about this kind of betting. I told him the risk and how people (the bet predictor)  are just using it to make money from the victim (the bettor) and yet the bettor which become the victims will lose. He tried it with $10 and paid $10 to the predictor and he was given 2 matches to bet from Ligue two (French league). When I saw it, I new it would definitely be a lost bet. He actually list the bet and also his money was not refunded. You are a newbie here, you just came up with this kind of scam idea, with telegram account which can not be linked to your real identity. People should just avoid you or they will be scammed. Do not trust someone that has nothing to lose.

comments.author: romanzelovsky
comments.body: My luck, and your misfortune that you have no idea what you are writing about. Just because someone has a post on bitcointalk doesn’t mean they’re a scammer and have no idea what they’re writing about. Your 2000 posts are no guarantee either.My goal is to get contacts who need help with payment with local bookmakers who do not move the odds, or maybe they need help with China stake. I can help them in the beginning with small stakes, and later with bigger ones. I don't play tipsters from whom I lose money.Those in this business understand what I am looking for and what I need.

comments.body: Try to scam else where but not here;Who would trust a brand-new account her with their money, lolQuote from: romanzelovsky on May 28, 2022, 09:19:36 AMMy luck, and your misfortune that you have no idea what you are writing about.We exactly have an idea of what you are trying to do. To scam!QuoteYour 2000 posts are no guarantee either.At least his reputation can be at stake, unlike youQuote from: romanzelovsky on May 28, 2022, 09:19:36 AMMy goal is to get contacts who need help with payment with local bookmakers who do not move the odds, or maybe they need help with China stake. Even local bookmakers change odds. Once the tickets are placed online, you will find that some odds change in the print-out.

Even local bookmakers change odds. Once the tickets are placed online, you will find that some odds change in the print-out.You're a really funny guy. How I can scam you if I bet for you? Explain us? You send me 3 win tips I bet for you without guarantee. There are really a lot of idiots on this forum. If you bet in locals bookie in Italy, Czech, Romania, Russia you dont touch odd on Bet365 or Pinnacle or Asianodds. Locals can only removed tip, or blocked in locals in this country, but odds are stable online. You dont know difference between offline and online betting. I dont bet analysis and tipster for other sources.I need only source who win.

comments.author: Maslate
comments.body: Sorry mate but looks like we already read a lot of these offers before and it never worked. We can use very simple logic, if you can make money by betting, then why do you have to help people to make money?I'm sure the service you offered woudl require us to subscribe to you and pay on what we called a subscription fee.How is it different from what others are offering?

Did you have "special odds"? No of course. No one could trust or take an advantage from this kind of service!How it can be trusted a service like that without any track record or previous feedback?Definitely an high risk initiative (it's not the first time these are proposed here in forum) but it's just a scam attempt or an useless way for "making money".

comments.body: Quote from: romanzelovsky on May 28, 2022, 09:19:36 AM[snip]Those in this business understand what I am looking for and what I need.Well, as I see --you are looking for prey that perhaps you can milking them with their money. [I am right?]Think about it, how do people trust your offer --you even don't have a good history or feedback about your services that have been successfully giving profit to the user of your service.We know how to select a good betting site that there is no need a third party like you.

We can use very simple logic, if you can make money by betting, then why do you have to help people to make money?I'm sure the service you offered woudl require us to subscribe to you and pay on what we called a subscription fee.How is it different from what others are offering?So you didn’t understand the general of what I was offering.If you need to increase the payout for your matches you play and you do not have enough paid, we are here to help.I’m not asking you to pay anything in advance, but the matches you pay to help add stake.Our league what can be interested for stake:Football (Serbia, Croatia, Slovenia, Bosnia, Bulgaria, Romania, Czech, Austria, Russia, Ukraine, Belarus, Kazahstan, Macedonia, Montenegro - all leagues, also lower league)Basket (Serbia, Croatia, Slovenia, Bosnia, Romania, Austria, Czech, Russia)...Tennis (ITF, Challenger)Handball...Understand now, also if you need high stake, I can help

You can avoid to waste such precious time here : just by placing your info for betting!

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: I am in no way justifying the services OP is offering or saying they are legit and that he will hold up his part of the deal, but it seems to me that many didn't understanding what is being offered here. First of all, OP isn't asking you to send him any money. You are not paying him to receive information about an alleged fixed match. You are supposed to tell him about such matches only if you have such information. If you can't make the bet yourself because you don't want to, you are scared to do it, or for any other reason, OP claims he will do it for you. He will bet with his own money and the two of you agree how to split the profits. At least that's how I understood the offer. This doesn't mean that it's not a scam but also not that it is. I personally don't like what I see and don't trust him, but everyone should make up their own mind.Quote from: bitbollo on May 28, 2022, 03:02:42 PMTaraz next match is programmed for next month. I don't now what you mean with "now". Taraz played a match yesterday at 14:00 CET. They won 3:0 and were leading 2:0 at halftime. OP posted that tip of his at 12:49 forum time, that's 14:49 CET, which means that the match was already at halftime when the prediction was posted. The prediction is therefore not worth anything since the first half already ended or was close to end when the post was made.

comments.author: Eureka_07
comments.body: Quote from: romanzelovsky on May 28, 2022, 12:02:02 PM<snip>Understand now, also if you need high stake, I can helpPerhaps you can try to state in a more clear way every important detail of your service. I think it has mislead people here. Can I ask how will you be able to increase the payout for the matches that we are playing? Does it have any integration with any online bookmaker?

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: romanzelovsky on May 28, 2022, 12:49:06 PMYou dont need send me money in advance. What do you mean by "we don't need to send money in advance"? Your reputation is at issue because you are a new account here, which is very clear. Why should people trust you with their money? You can just take money and run since you have no reputation to lose. How about using an escrow? At least then we can be sure that you will deliver the service.

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: romanzelovsky on May 28, 2022, 12:49:06 PMYou dont need send me money in advance. Send me 3 time your win match, can I trust you have really good matches. You can bet 3k on Czech Republic football 3rd league?? Very hard, but I can. And somebody who need help, I can help. If you are that much precise with your betting picks, why don't you bet yourself and make a lot of money? Secondly, you may provide three betting predictions correct based on luck only and then you try to scam those people who trusted you by seeing your three correct bets. However, if you are not so lucky with your initial three bets, you will try with another customer and you have nothing to lose.

You can just take money and run since you have no reputation to lose. How about using an escrow? At least then we can be sure that you will deliver the service.Hold on, do not fall for this offer of not sending the money in advance. OP have posted the same thread in gambling section HELP WITH BETTING! BETTING FOR YOU! MAKE MONEY WITH ME! and have not got any good response. If anyone looking to get this offer, please first read the comments from the people on that other thread.
